name: My first puzzles: Circus
description:
Kids from 2 to 6 will have fun solving their first puzzles.

With 13 different puzzles, nice sound effects, beautiful graphics, this game will entertain your children while improving their motor skills.

Don't forget to shake your iPhone to replay a puzzle.

This game is part of our "Learning is fun" collection of educational games. Visit our web site for more info: http://ar-entertainment.net/learning/
